Addressing #SDoH requires a multifaceted approach and the development of actionable frameworks for how communities can work together. We’re proud to introduce the Anthem Social Determinants of Health Action Framework, a new collaboration with @HealthCharities.

Learn how a new grant from the @AnthemFDN will support @HealthCharities in collaborating with local community partners in Indianapolis to identify critical social determinants of health priorities and apply a new Anthem #SDoH Action Framework.

The Anthem Social Determinants of Health Action Framework takes a collaborative, community-based approach to address the social drivers of health. Learn how @HealthCharities is going to use the framework in Indianapolis, IN and apply learnings on a national scale.
